dmca.title: Arcadia Software Complains About Postings
dmca.body:
SWIGGART & AGIN 

[private]
BOSTON, Massachusetts 02108-1906 
TEL: [private]
FAX; [private]
www.swigart.com
E-mail: [private]

VIA FACSIMILE to [private]

Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints 
December 15, 2003 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private] 
Mountain View, CA 94043 

Re: Arcadia Software Development Corporation 
Arcadia PowerButton v3.0 
Our File No. [private]
Dear Sir or Madam: 
This Digital Millennium Copyright Act complaint is on behalf of my client, Arcadia Software Development Corporation. The copyrighted work at issue is the software: Arcadia PowerButton v3.0, which is developed and sold by my client. 
Last week, a hacker unlawfully posted a full version of the said software- together with a with a valid activation serial number -- on a several East Asian languages sites- 
1. Search Query: Arcadia PowerButton 
2. Infringing Web Pages (at present time): 
.
